text: Nde na phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, gu ntigem wo buni vhɨzav, gu won raar vhuun nde ndɨɨi. Nde wari wo mbui tɨvi mbarigi ndi thɨgar maaŋv, nde khaŋ tɨgap havhargip guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi kɨri. Nde gu suaŋgi buni mbararari! Nde vhɨra, nde zam ndɨkndɨk bavira muuŋv, wari tɨgɨp ndava bavira kɨri. Fhe Bakɨme ana ndava ndi ndɨɨi tɨvar nɨɨŋge ma. Ana vhɨra ndava bavira ki nɨɨŋge ma. Ana nde phorgɨ kɨri.
